mapper.update:
update branch_area
tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
branch_id = #{branchId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
code = #{code,jdbcType=CHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_update_by = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_update_at = #{lastUpdateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT},
local_id = #{localId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select * from branch_area t where t.tenant_id = ${tenantId} and t.branch_id=${branchId} and t.is_deleted=0
AND (t.code LIKE '%${codeOrName}%' OR t.name LIKE '%${codeOrName}%')
order by t.create_at asc
LIMIT ${offset},${rows}

select count(1) from branch_area t where t.tenant_id = ${tenantId} and t.branch_id=${branchId} and t.is_deleted=0
AND (t.code LIKE '%${codeOrName}%' OR t.name LIKE '%${codeOrName}%')
SELECT * FROM branch_area b WHERE b.tenant_id=${tenantId} AND b.branch_id=${branchId} AND is_deleted=0 AND id=#{id}
SELECT max(b.code) FROM branch_area b WHERE b.tenant_id=${tenantId} AND b.branch_id=${branchId} AND b.is_deleted=0
SELECT count(1) FROM branch_table WHERE is_deleted=0 AND tenant_id=${tenantId} AND branch_area_id=#{areaId}
